verses.text: \w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w faithfulness|strong="H2617"\w*.
\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H4100"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* say, “\w Where|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w their|strong="H1471"\w* God?”

\w Our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*; \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w pleases|strong="H2654"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H3027"\w* \w idols|strong="H6091"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w made|strong="H4639"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* men.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*; \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*;

\w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* ears, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* noses, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w smell|strong="H7306"\w*;

\w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w feel|strong="H4184"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w even|strong="H3808"\w* clear \w their|strong="H3808"\w* throats.\f + \fr 115:7 \ft Literally they cannot utter with their throat\f*

\w Those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* trust \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,\f + \fr 115:9 \ft MT; many Hebrew manuscripts, LXX, and Syriac O house of Israel\f* trust \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*! \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w help|strong="H5828"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Aaron, trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*! \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w help|strong="H5828"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*.

You \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*! \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w help|strong="H5828"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w mindful|strong="H2142"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w us|strong="H2142"\w*; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w us|strong="H2142"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Aaron;

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w those|strong="H5973"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*— \w small|strong="H6996"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w alike|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H3254"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w increase|strong="H3254"\w*, \w both|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Maker|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w highest|strong="H8064"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* belong \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* mankind.

\w It|strong="H3381"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w descend|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w silence|strong="H1745"\w*.

\w But|strong="H6258"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H1288"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* who \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, both \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w forevermore|strong="H5769"\w*. Hallelujah!\f + \fr 115:18 \ft Or Hallelu YAH, meaning Praise the LORD\f*
